text: The 21st congressional district of Ohio was a congressional district in the state of Ohio. It was eliminated in the redistricting following the 1990 census. In its last decade, the district consisted of a large portion of eastern Cuyahoga county. == List of members representing the district == {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" |- valign=bottom !
